# MeORYou - Real-time Multiplayer Memory Game

Real-time multiplayer memory game using React, Express, and Socket.io

## Quick Start

### Development
```bash
./start.sh
```

### Manual Development
```bash
# Terminal 1 - Server
cd server && npm run dev

# Terminal 2 - Client
cd client && npm run dev
```

### Production Build
```bash
cd client && npm run build
```

## Stack
- **Frontend**: React 19 + Vite
- **Backend**: Express.js + Socket.io
- **Styling**: CSS with Framer Motion animations

## Deployments
- **Frontend**: Vercel (see vercel.json)
- **Backend**: Render, Railway, or any Node.js host

See [README.md](README.md) for full documentation.
